channel.title: Quick script that F5s
channel.description: Can anyone just quickly help me make a script that basically Hits F5 say 2 X per second for like 5 minutes?

item.title: Quick script that F5s
item.dc:creator: @FrostFyr FrostFÿr
item.description:
@FrostFyr wrote:

Well it’s really not all that hard just keydown(and up) the F5 byte every 500ms for about 300 times.
You must also target the client.

[code]program F5er;
const
//Edit these to your liking.\
TimeBetween = 0.5;//Seconds
HowLong = 300;//Seconds
//Do not edit past this point.\
TB = TimeBetween * 1000;
HL = HowLong * 1000;

begin
ActivateClient;
repeat
KeyDown(116);
Wait(10);
KeyUp(116);
Wait(Round(TB - 10));
Until (GetTimeRunning>Round(HL)) or (IsFKeyDown(9))
end.[/code]
F9 stops it early if need be.

Read full topic
